p: Previous preclinical and clinical studies using the intramuscular route, in which MSC were administered as treatment for patients with critical limb ischaemia and/or non-healing ulcers, show that the treatment was well-tolerated and there was no evidence for local or systemic toxicity, as we discussed above. 17 31 33 34 Additionally, a number of clinical studies using cellular products for critical limb ischaemia in the upper limb have applied the intramuscular administration route with success. 57â€“59
